name: SHMUP 64
description:
This is my entry for the LowRez Jam 2020, The game was made over 2 weeks in my spare time.

You play our hero who has to save the world from invading aliens in an 'alternate reality'. The game is a vertical scrolling shoot 'em up where you need to 'keep moving' and shoot the aliens to avoid getting killed.

The scoring system for the game is star based, you will get 1 star for completing a level, another if you kill all the enemies in the level and a 3rd if you do all this while losing no lives.

There are currently 3 levels in the game

Controls

arrow keys - movement

space bar - fire
